description:
This course will teach you how to create your own professionally animated avatars for use in presentations, marketing demos, explainer videos and others, through an easy to use and powerful teaching tool.

CrazyTalk Animator is a fully-featured animation tool designed for users to create professional marketing video, and for presenters to quickly add animated avatars and comic effects into PowerPoint, Keynote, Google Doc and other presentation software. With it's full editing capabilities users can easily design unique characters and specific motions, to later copy-and-paste to most web and office applications. Characters can also be added into marketing videos to effectively increase the exposure rate for your business.

There is a free trial version that users are welcome to download in order to go through the entire course. Just to be clear, this course is not to promote sales of the software or content, but instead to show users that there are easy ways to create avatar animations for presentations.
title: Learn to Make Animated Presentations with Avatars
